data.eml:eml: A new miniature cryptic species of the seasonal killifish genus Spectrolebias from the Tocantins River basin, central Brazil (Cyprinodontiformes, Aplocheilidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Costa, Wilson J. E. M., Amorim, Pedro F. (2018): A new miniature cryptic species of the seasonal killifish genus Spectrolebias from the Tocantins River basin, central Brazil (Cyprinodontiformes, Aplocheilidae). Zoosystematics and Evolution 94 (2): 359-368, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zse.94.28085, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zse.94.28085
